context: The Estonian word 'vali' is the imperative/command form of the verb 'valida', which means 'to choose' or 'to select'. It's used when telling someone to make a choice. The base form 'valida' can be conjugated into different forms: valin (I choose), validad (you choose - singular), valida (he/she/it chooses), valime (we choose), valite (you choose - plural), valivad (they choose).
